a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of potential polio cases with adequate stool collection, 2001 to
This is an indicator of testing for polio. It shows the share of acute flaccid paralysis (AFP) cases that were tested for poliovirus
Note: The WHO recommends that the adequate stool collection rate should be at least 80% to ensure that suspected cases are being
